import "./App.css"; import { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { getAll } from "./BooksAPI"; const Book = (props) => { const {imageUrl, title, authors} = props; return (
{title}
{authors}
) } function App() { const [showSearchPage, setShowSearchpage] = useState(false); const [myBooks, setMyBooks] = useState([]); useEffect( async () => { let data = await getAll() console.log(data) }, []) return (
{showSearchPage ? (
setShowSearchpage(!showSearchPage)} > Close
    ) : (

    MyReads

    Currently Reading

    2. Ender's Game
      Orson Scott Card

    Want to Read

    1. 1776
      David McCullough
    2. Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
      J.K. Rowling

    Read

    1. The Hobbit
      J.R.R. Tolkien
    2. Oh, the Places You'll Go!
      Seuss
    3. The Adventures of Tom Sawyer
      Mark Twain
    setShowSearchpage(!showSearchPage)}>Add a book
    )}
    ); } export default App;
